price: 31. Zeg (o Mohammed): “Wacht! Ik ben met jullie, onder de wachtenden!”
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
